attributes.action: Stoping the use of homophobic language
attributes.additional_details: We are a Year 10 group from Nower Hill High School campaignig against homophobia . Our main objective is to reduce the use of homophobic language in schools so that the younger generation can develop well and create a better future for our society . It is always said , a small change creates a big impact. Please sign this petition to show your support. Thank You!
